page.title: 14ROUNDERS AT BEAFORD
page.content: My favourite game is Rounders. The object of the game is for one team to score more rounders than the other team. We use a tennis ball, wooden bats, four posts and two mats. First one team fields while the other team bats. The bowler stands on a mat a few metres from the batter, who also stands on a mat. The batter has to hit the ball, then try and run around the four posts before the bowler gets the ball back from the fielders. The posts are spaced out to make a kind of square. When the batter goes all the way round, that is a rounder. The batter must stop at a post if the bowler gets the ball back, or he will be out. Fielders who catch the ball can get you out, too. Sometimes we play till the whole team is out, sometimes we play so many minutes for each team. I'm good at rounders.
